projects.title: Self-Sovereign Identity and Verifiable Data
projects.about: This was my bachelor thesis. I created a PoC where Self-Sovereign Identity and Verifiable Data (blockchain techonologies) were used to automate the process of applying for unemployment benefits.

projects.title: Detecting Ballan Wrasse
projects.about: In this project I used traditional computer vision techinques and machine learning to detect ballan wrasse in different underwater enivronments.

projects.title: Madshus Ski Database
projects.about: A Madshus ski database built with PhP and mySQL. As well as an API with CRUD functionality.

projects.title: 2D Action Platformer
projects.about: A 2D action platforming game built with Unity and C#.

projects.title: Twitch-Discord-API
projects.about: A discord bot that can interact with a Twitch API.

projects.title: MetIma
projects.about: A desktop application that extracts metadata from images. The application is written in Java.
